title: Строптивая мишень
overview: Of course, Dina had had troubles before. But she would have lived comfortably in her small provincial town if it weren't for the secret hobbies and criminal inclinations of her husband Oleg, nicknamed Student. Because of him, Dina got into real trouble.Fleeing from who knows where the mysterious pursuers and the bandit Eddie fell upon her, Dina met a reliable friend and true love. Now she knows how to move on with her life.Dizzying chases, scary and funny bandits, involuntary lies and deliberate deception, suspicions, distrust of those who are nearby - all this remains in the past, in a small town, with which, having experienced many bitter moments, the heroes who have become inseparable, Dina and Alexey, her savior and chosen one.
